description:
This course has tried and true strategies that will help you, or your child, reach the greatest level of success! You will start with goal setting, and learn how to create action plans for each goal. You will learn to how to create a home study area, what materials to include, and how to use a study calendar and determine target dates for assignments. You will also learn how, and why, to create a home filing system, why graphic organizers are important to use, and the different types for different assignments. You will finally learn how to create note cards according to the latest brain research, and how to add mnemonic devices will help you remember information better, faster, and retain the information longer.

Take this class, and end up at the HEAD of the class!

These are strategies that will continue to strengthen your abilities as you move from elementary school to middle and high school, and into college and the work force. These are life skills that will lead you to greater success.

11 lectures presented in 1 hour and 42 minutes!
title: Learn Successful Study Skills:
